node.excerpt: Ngrx is a group of Angular libraries for reactive extensions. Ngrx/Store implements the Redux pattern using the well-known RxJS #mind map

frontmatter.title: Angular NGRX
frontmatter.description:
Ngrx is a group of Angular libraries for reactive extensions. Ngrx/Store implements the Redux pattern using the well-known RxJS
Wikipidia
